data.name: Hero Boy - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack of Hero Boy, composed by Paul Wiele.

1. Main Title
2. Don't Bully Me
3. Zombies On The March
4. Relief
5. The Brethren Of The Coast
6. I've Got A Bad Feeling About This
7. Epinephrine
8. A Death-Defying Performance
9. What's The Matter
10. The Kingdom Of Goblinland
11. Snakes And Ladders
12. MAX IN SPACE!
13. Hero Boy
14. Epilogue
15. Underture
16. Max Is Dyed And Sad
